# O quê é o Tmux

Tmux it's a teminal multiplex, witch means that it could persue differents taks at the same time. That tool brings feactures like, saving point and infinit split windows.


# Pra quê serve

This tool can make a bount of differente conections to server, like SSH conections. 

# Usage

Tmuz is base commands follow one master keey [ctl + b] + command. For exemple:

[ctl + b] + c = make a new windown

[ctl + b] + % = make a new vertical split

[ctl + b] + " = make a new horizontal split
